pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window7, 8 ,10
  • Processor: INTERCORE i5 - 4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970/ AMD Randeon R9290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Randeon RX 480 equivalent or better
